name: MEGACHONKER (LD51)
description:
Not polished at all, just a quick shot for Ludum Dare 51 because I had a cute little idea that came from the CHONK chart meme. ;-)

Every 10 seconds your ship gets a new expansion that makes its hitbox larger, until it becomes the MEGACHONKER!

Only your main ship (the middle ship part) can collect and use the speedup items. The rest of your ship is getting in your way more and more.

Try to score as much points as you can before you die.

---

Movement: WASD Keys, Fire Laser: SPACE Key

You can't spam your laser too much because the fire rate is limited, so aiming is key to survival.

(decided against powering up your laser when your ship gets bigger because the game became too easy)

---

Many thanks to Kenney for making his Ship Mixer Tool and for being a blessing for the gamedev community!

---

Known Issues:

  • Energy bar is kinda random (does what it wants).
  • Collecting speedup items isn't working as smooth as intended.
  • No sounds, no music, no special fx (yet).
